job_title: Anonymous Employee in Hempstead, Essex, East of England, England
pros: you get 30 days a PTO per year.
cons: This place values seniority, not skill or knowledge. If you are young and your ambitious, Stay away. You will be working with people who don't know much and old enough to be your grandparents.
